meanings.sent1: I love to eat kielbasy with mustard on top.
meanings.sent2: The kielbasy at the Polish deli is always fresh and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: At the family picnic, Uncle Joe juggled kielbasy instead of balls!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling kielbasy filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The kielbasy was so juicy and delicious, it melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: We bought two pounds of kielbasy for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The kielbasy were the highlight of the party, disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent3: The kids used kielbasy as pretend swords in their playful duel.
meanings.sent4: The kielbasy on the grill sizzled like a chorus of tasty fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The colorful array of kielbasy on display looked like a delicious rainbow.
